comments.body: Would be good to have them package the license file and then simply pass that along here instead of including their license file in our recipe. Raised issue ( https://github.com/zopefoundation/roman/issues/9 )
@thewchan can you please follow up with upstream and make sure this is being handled correctly? ðŸ™‚

@jakirkham it looks like they changed their license from ZPL-2.1 to PFL-2.1 (Python software foundation license 2.1); I saw your PR was closed over there too. I once their repo goes through the deployment process the license will be included in the wheel file. Is there anything I need to change at the feedstock?

Would try running `python setup.py sdist` and seeing if the license file gets packaged in the `sdist`. Also would raise an issue on the feedstock to switch to `PFL-2.1` on the next release and to drop the license file from the recipe (assuming the previous step works)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@  home: https://github.com/zopefoundation/roman
  license: ZPL-2.1
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Integer to Roman numerals converter'
  description: |
